title: Smoked trout with spinach and poached egg

ingredients.item: 4 tbsp essential Waitrose low fat natural yogurt

instructions.step: Wash 500g essential Waitrose spinach and place in a large pan; cover and cook over a low heat until wilted.  Meanwhile, mix together 4 tbsp essential Waitrose low fat natural yogurt with 2 tbsp chopped tarragon or parsley.  Poach 4 eggs, then microwave 4 hot smoked trout fillets,following packet instructions. Serve the trout on a bed of wilted spinach, topped with a poached egg and a spoonful of tarragon or parsley yogurt sauce.
